Name: Way On Where
About the game: Way On Where is a indie game developed by Exio Entertainments which offers you a next-gen game with impressive graphics and physics, Way on Where merges technology, game design, theme and emotions into a world where you explore to find answers. The setting is 2019. The Modern Era where everything is connected ,The game starts from Mumbai, where you will begin your journey in the game, and letting the game takes you to the different parts of the world to correct your mistakes. You are a Thief, an Athlete, a Charismatic young man. Your actions can make your life either joyful or miserable. Be a Master Thief - Master the skills, tactics and your techniques. Plan your moves, defend yourself and find your way to escape. Realistic and responsive environments - Experience a living, breathing world in which all your actions have consequences. Crowds react to your moves and will either help or hinder you on your mission. Tamil Language – This Game's Full Audio is made in Tamil. Immersive Plot - Strong and Immersive Story with a different narrative pattern, which will connect you with the life of Kyle. Breath taking Effects - This game is fully Loaded with numerous visually stunning Particle effects and Sound Effects. Next-gen gameplay – The Game was developed with Unreal Engine 4, which allows organic game design featuring open gameplay, intuitive control scheme, realistic interaction with environment and a fluid, yet sharp, combat mechanic.
